Desc.entry: In line with Department of Health publications Valuing People and Valuing People Now, Sheffield First for Health and Wellbeing Partnership, the Learning Disability Partnership Board aims to develop services, policy and opportunities to help all adults with a learning disability live positive and fulfilling lives eg to exercise choice and control, experience better health, live in the home of their choice, access employment and education opportunities, enjoy friendships and relationships, fully participate in society and exercise full rights as citizens.
